entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
